question: Which of the following is a MAJOR task of test planning?

answers.A: Scheduling test analysis and design tasks.

question: The Phases of formal review process is mentioned below arrange them in the correct order.
sub_question:
i. Planning
ii. Review Meeting
iii. Rework
iv. Individual Preparations
v. Kick Off
vi. Follow Up

answers.A: i, ii, iii, iv, v, vi
answers.B: vi, i, ii, iii, iv, v
answers.C: i, v, iv, ii, iii, vi
